name: Cozy reading lights
description: Looking for useful lights for late-night reading? Lightbook brings you one of the finest and most high-quality collection of cozy night lights! From lamps that illuminate pages, to cute, decorative table lights, we have everything needed for diving deep into the stories, as the late hours slowly pass!

name: Cute night glows
description: Get the best cute decorational lights for your room. Give your space the comfort and atmosphere it needs for enhancing every moment you spend in there. Enjoy message board on which you can write your own messages, goals or motivational quotes, or light bunny, which is the loveliest little thing. Explore pure cuteness on Lightbook!
